Using our app is simple and straightforw: Using our app is simple and straightforward. Here are the steps you need to follow to get started and make the most out of its features
Choose the service you want to get: Choose the service you want to get
Share photos, videos and add a message: Share photos, videos and add a message

Select the specific service you need fro: Select the specific service you need from the options. This will help us tailor our offerings to best meet your requirements and ensure you receive the most relevant assistance
Upload photos and videos, and include a: Upload photos and videos, and include a personalized message to describe the issue better. This will help us understand your concern more clearly through both visual and written content
Select the preferred date and location f: Select the preferred date and location for your service. This ensures that we can accommodate your schedule and provide service at the most convenient place for you
Complete your booking by making a paymen: Complete your booking by making a payment for the service. This final step secures your appointment and ensures that everything is set for your chosen date and location

To use the services, register the desire: To use the services, register the desired order with just a few taps from your smartphone, familiarize yourself with the pre-approved prices in the application, consult with the master and make a decision. Get started today.
We provide reliable, high-quality, affor: We provide reliable, high-quality, affordable services, which are carried out thanks to masters with years of experience and knowledge. Make managing your home or business space improvements easier than ever. Discover a new standard of relief from everyday worries with our platform.
By choosing any of our services, you wil: By choosing any of our services, you will save your valuable time. Our efficient processes and experienced team ensure that you get the results you need without any delays, allowing you to focus on what really matters.
Our team consists of highly qualified an: Our team consists of highly qualified and experienced professionals who are masters in their respective fields. Armed with years of experience and knowledge, our specialists are able to effectively solve any problem that the client receives.
We understand that every customer has un: We understand that every customer has unique needs and preferences. That's why we offer customized solutions specifically for your needs. We are sure that your consultation with the master will get the desired result.
Our commitment to excellence means we gu: Our commitment to excellence means we guarantee a flawless result. From start to finish, we pay meticulous attention to every detail. Our goal is to show the client a result that exceeds his expectations.
How to register as a master?: How to register as a master?

It is possible to register more than one: Is it possible to register more than one order?
To register as a master, you need to dow: To register as a master, you need to download the Varpet partner application, complete the required steps, specify the services provided, and confirm. After passing the inspection with us, the page will be activated, and the master will be notified. You can contact us for questions and detailed information.
If you do not find any service, you can: If you do not find any service, you can specify the visit subsection of the relevant department and write what you need in the comment. You can also call our office during working hours and register the order with the assistance of our staff.
It can happen if the master has done add: This can happen if the master has performed additional work to complete the specified order. It's also possible that the master is unaware of the application's rules; in such cases, the master is warned, and if the issue persists, they may be removed from the platform. To prevent such issues, please provide as much detail as possible about the existing problems and requirements during your phone call.
Registering on the platform does not hav: Registering on the platform has no restrictions. You can register in your preferred section, accept orders, track your progress, and achieve high scores.
If all the instructions are done correct: If all instructions are followed correctly, the activation of the Master will occur within a week.
Yes, you can register an order for your: Yes, you can register an order for your family members or loved ones from anywhere in the country. Using the application or website, specify the address where the master should go. You can also include an additional phone number in the comment field.
Yes, it is possible to include several s: Yes, it is possible to include multiple services in a single order, but it will be more effective if they are from the same field. You can also register multiple separate orders from different sectors, in which case the specialists from those departments will contact you using the phone number you provided.
